page.title: 15George Inn, Middlezoy
page.content: The George Inn, Middlezoy is a 17th Century coaching inn. It is owned by the licencees Mr and Mrs D Stewart. Many of the village's social and recreational activities take place there. Skittles and darts are popular games and there are local teams for both. The pub also has bar billiards and American Pool tables. As the pub is a free house the landlord is able to offer a selection of beers and other drinks from a variety of local breweries. The George Inn has a reputation for providing good food which is all home cooked by Mrs Stewart. They are also able to offer bed and breakfast. Local groups such as the W.I. and the P.T.A. occasionally hold functions at the George, because it is such a popular venue.
